contexts.context: ...body bleeds out away from you. There is a <mark>risk</mark> here of becoming blood stained if you don't move...
...while still holding him from behind, and the <mark>risk</mark> of staining one's clothes with blood is practically nonexistant...
...daring, Lord Vivec. I shall not shun <mark>risk</mark>, nor hide behind the mask of cautious counsel...
...relate many stories of Vivec's experiments with challenge and <mark>risk</mark>, his failures and triumphs, his blessings of...
